name: BlackBerry Express Presentation
summary: An EXPRESS file is a presentation created by BlackBerry Express, a presentation app installed on some BlackBerry devices. It contains one or more presentation slides, which likely include text and images. EXPRESS files are renamed .TAR archives that contain the data used to show a presentation.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Rename .express to .tar ; extract contents with any TAR extraction utility
